titleStmt.title: A letter of a gentleman to his friend, shewing that the bishops are not to be judges in Parliament in cases capital
titleStmt.author: Holles, Denzil Holles, Baron, 1599-1680.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Denzil Hollis Holles. Cf. BLC.
Page 119 is torn in filmed copy. Pages 100-end photographed from Cambridge University Library copy and inserted at end.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
